author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Triumph Composite Work For Boeing 787 Dreamliner Extended In Long-Term Contract
text:
April 25 (Reuters) - Triumph Group Inc:
* TRIUMPH COMPOSITE WORK FOR BOEING 787 DREAMLINER EXTENDED IN LONG-TERM CONTRACT
* TRIUMPH - REACHED AGREEMENT WITH BOEING TO EXTEND CURRENT LONG-TERM AGREEMENT TO SUPPLY COMPOSITE DETAIL & ASSEMBLY PARTS FOR BOEING 787 DREAMLINER
* TRIUMPH GROUP INC - UNDER TERMS TRIUMPH AEROSPACE STRUCTURESâ€™ BUSINESS BASED OUT OF GEORGIA WILL CONTINUE PRODUCTION OF COMPOSITE PARTS FOR 787 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
